form.feishuDocument: Batch recognize invoice information in images and PDFs,and export the results to a multidimensional table. Please refer to:

content.textSelect: Field type needs to be text
content.moneySelect: Field type must be numeric or monetary
content.dateSelect: Field type must be text or date
content.fpdmTitle: Please select the invoice code column:
content.fpdmRemind: Invoice code【Note: Full electronic invoice is not required to be transmitted,others must be transmitted】
content.fphmTitle: Please select the invoice number column:
content.xymTitle: Please select the verification code column:
content.xymRemind: Verification code【Note: Special ticket and full electric ticket can be left blank,others must be filled in.The verification code supports both full and last 6 digits】
content.kprqTitle: Please select the invoicing date column:
content.bhsjeTitle: Please select the column without tax amount:
content.bhsjeRemind: Excluding tax amount【Note: General invoices may not be transferred,other invoices must be filled in.For full electronic invoices,please transfer including tax amount,while other invoices need to transfer excluding tax amount】
content.yzTitle: Please select the column to export 'consistency' to:
content.zfTitle: Please select the column to export 'void' to:
content.chTitle: Please select the column to export 'whether to flush red' to:
